creditline: Given in memory of Byron H. and Doreen R. McKinney
description: celadon green glaze; small ring foot; body tapers outward to shoulder; rather tall neck; outward-flaring mouth rim; band of relief round elements flanked by ribs on neck; flowers in relief around shoulder; relief design on body of standing figures alternating with bells (?) with tassels; incised decorative band around bottom edge
title: Vase
